verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came מִיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> mi-ya-Mim time רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> rab-Bim, And it came to pass a long אַ֠חֲרֵי <WH310> 'A-cha-rei after אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after הֵנִ֨יחַ <WH5117> he-Ni-ach had given rest יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> le-Yis-ra-'El unto Israel מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Hem from all their enemies מִסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> mis-sa-Viv; round about וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> vi-ho-Shu-a' that Joshua זָקֵ֔ן <WH2205> za-Ken, aged בָּ֖א <WH935> ba [and] stricken בַּיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> bai-ya-Mim. in age

רְאוּ֩ <WH7200> re-'U Behold הִפַּ֨לְתִּי <WH5307> hip-Pal-ti I have divided לָכֶ֜ם la-Chem אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֠גּוֹיִם <WH1471> Hag-go-yim unto you by lot these nations הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֥ים <WH7604> han-nish-'a-Rim that remain הָאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh these בְּנַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> be-na-cha-Lah to be an inheritance לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶ֑ם <WH7626> le-shiv-tei-Chem; for your tribes מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den, from Jordan וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> hag-go-Yim with all the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הִכְרַ֔תִּי <WH3772> hich-Rat-ti, that I have cut off וְהַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> ve-hai-Yam sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol even unto the great מְב֥וֹא <WH3996> me-Vo the setting הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> hash-Sha-mesh. of the sun
